E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1990
Subject: Todd Brown learns new position
Todd Brown has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Friday, 4/18/1990
Subject: Mark Whiten is sick...
Diagnosis: Viral Infection.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Jim Thome
Dear Sir,
Jim Thome has nothing more to prove at A Osceola Astros!
He has an AVG of .386 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
